duties_responsibilities.duty: Building and maintaining relationships with clients to drive sales and revenue growth.
Identifying and solving client problems by offering effective solutions and services.
Delivering compelling and persuasive sales presentations to potential clients.
Providing exceptional customer service and ensuring client satisfaction throughout the sales process.
Applying critical thinking to navigate the intricacies of commercial properties and management.
Meeting potential customers to generate new business for the company.
Training and guiding junior sales professionals in the team.

education_certification.credential: Strong customer service, communication, and critical thinking skills.
